title: England's National Team Travels To Miami To Acclimate For Tropical World Cup
teaser: To prepare for the humid climate of Brazil, the team is practicing in South Florida.
contentencoded:
The 2014 World Cup is less that a week away.Â The first soccer match will be between the home team, Brazil, and Croatia.

In the meantime, teams that aren’t in Brazil yet are getting ready by practicing in conditions similar to those they will find in a tropical climate — which is why England’s national team is in Miami.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, WLRN’s Kenny Malone reports.
